entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 50
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
